> <@!419518776992858122> Doubt he was cheating. Beryl 6x full auto spray is pretty effective lol
<@409827982455078912>
He was using red dot. He killed me without a single bullet missing the target. Also he knew I was behind a certain building and he was crouch waiting me whilst going closer with his team after he killed my other two teammates. No previous vision or gunshot of me or whatsoever. I know when I am beat and there was clearly a cheat honestly.

If he knew where you were/seeing through walls fair enough, they're the people I've seen (but very rarely) who were the most obvious cheats. But people get accused of aimbot a lot who may just be really good at the game. Watch Shroud or DanUCD or other top streamers, spinning 180 and perfectly controlling full auto-sprays killing targets a long way off — I bet they get reported for aimbot a lot. Some people are just bloody good at the game. But seeing through walls is more obvious, I got killed by someone the other day who knew where I was despite me hiding — his username ffffffffo0_ — I checked, his K/D last season 100 games was 17+. Obvious cheater. But as I say, some people are just really good.

> I’m going to ask again. Who’s bright idea was it to decide that stats for games on Paramo weren’t recorded? I mean, why?!? Also, by making one map in a separate queue to every other map, you’ve INCREASED queues 🤦🏼‍♂️ And why no solo or duos on the map?!? Genuinely, I question the intelligence of the people making these decisions. It’s absolutely preposterous that you think you’re improving things.
<@490548703208144906> 
Release of Paramo is an experimental way of doing seasonal content which is why it's in the separate queue we call labs. It was decided to be only released in squads because squads is the most played gamemode by far compared to others so it would have the least impact on splitting the playerbase/increasing queue times. Insulting others intelligence because you disagree on their decisions is not constructive. We welcome any and all feedback and read it all, but we do not welcome insulting or toxic behavior.

<@213002637107265537> I think it’s probably because AR’s are the norm in ranked, and there was a distinct lack of AR extended/extended quick draw mags. They’ll of had to reduce the spawn rate of something to accommodate this, and smg’s being much less used, it sort of makes sense.
